ua.chernov.taskmanager.transport

Class ClientTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.chernov.taskmanager.transport.Transport
      • ua.chernov.taskmanager.transport.ClientTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manager

    public class ClientTransport
extends Transport
implements Manager
    Client-side transport. Room methods processes in current thread, processes server events in separate event loop. Room methods -> Transport packets (current thread) Transport packets -> Subscriber methods (separate thread)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ua.chernov.taskmanager.Manager
